text:
Company: Conner, Benitez and Valencia

Role: Senior Human Capital Partnership and Performance Management Analyst

Company Background:
Conner, Benitez and Valencia is a leading consultancy firm dedicated to providing innovative business solutions. We take pride in fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace where every employee can thrive. 

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a Senior Human Capital Partnership and Performance Management Analyst to join our dynamic team. This role requires a candidate with strong interpersonal skills and a solid background in human resources. You will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to enhance employee performance and drive organizational success.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement performance management strategies.
- Partner with leadership to identify human capital needs and solutions.
- Conduct workforce analysis and provide actionable insights.
- Facilitate training and development programs.
- Monitor and report on performance metrics.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in human resources, with a focus on performance management.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proficiency in HR software and tools.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from €60,000 to €80,000 annually, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off and holiday schedule.
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
- Inclusive and supportive workplace culture.

At Conner, Benitez and Valencia, we celebrate the diversity of our employees and welcome candidates from all backgrounds to join our team. Our inclusive culture welcomes all individuals.
